common_2020_koori_020_koori_01a:
The weather’s in your favor today. I guess the
snowy mountains decided to be kind.[VAR 0114(001A)]
common_2020_koori_020_koori_01b:
Well, tough luck for you. The snowy mountains
are on my side today.[VAR 0114(001A)]
common_2020_koori_020_koori_02:
These League-mandated inspections happen
a few times a year.[VAR 0114(001A)]
common_2020_koori_020_koori_03:
If we don’t show we’re up for the job, we’ll lose
our positions as Gym Leaders.[VAR 0114(001A)]
common_2020_koori_020_koori_04: Geeta always says it’s just a formality, but...[VAR 0114(001A)]
common_2020_koori_020_koori_05:
I’ve already had to give up on being a pro
snowboarder. If she takes away the talents\r
I still have to show, then what’ll be left?[VAR 0114(001A)]
common_2020_koori_020_koori_06:
Sorry, didn’t mean to bring the temperature
down. It’s simple enough, really.[VAR 0114(001A)]
common_2020_koori_020_koori_07:
All I need to do is make sure the power of my
Pokémon chills you to the bone![VAR 0114(001A)]
common_2020_koori_020_koori_08:
Man, Geeta must really have it out for me.
Sending someone there’s no way I could beat...[VAR 0114(001A)]
common_2020_koori_020_koori_09:
Still, no regrets on my part. I gave it everything
I had.[VAR 0114(001A)]
common_2020_koori_020_koori_10:
I hit you full force, and I lost anyway. It made me
feel...frustrated.[VAR 0114(001A)]
common_2020_koori_020_koori_11:
It makes me want to become stronger as a Gym
Leader. Put more of myself into it.[VAR 0114(001A)]
common_2020_koori_020_koori_12:
I’d thought my passion had frozen over, but...
you’ve rekindled it for me.\c
Thanks, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(001A)]
common_2020_koori_020_koori_13: I won’t lose next time. You’ll see.[VAR 0114(001A)]
common_2020_koori_020_koori_14:
Try not to catch a cold on your way down
the mountain, eh?[VAR 0114(001A)]
